RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList

RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList Class Reference

#include <serverlist.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Tghe fltk Fl_Group used to show the list of server.

It contains a Fl_Hold_Browser showing the servers' name and some widgets showing the selected one.

The informations shown are : the creation date of the server, its description, its IP adress, its port and its technical note.

This informations are stored in tServerListItem, a item of tServerList.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::refresh (  ) 

Refresh the server list.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::ServerList::i_cbAdd (  )  [inline, private]

The inline callback to add a server.

It creates a AddServer dialog if the global addServer pointer is NULL. otherwise, it shows the existign AddServer dialog.
